title: Shape of Love: Omizu de Mitsuketa Honki no Koi
original_name: Shape of Love お水で見つけた本気の恋
sinopse:
1. Shape of Love: Omizu de Mitsuketa Honki no Koi (Shape of Love: A Serious Love Found by Seduction)
   2-3. an★do Twin Star: Nipponichi Yuumei ni Naritai Futago no Monogatari (an★do Twin Star: A Story About a Pair of Twins Who Wants to be Number One in Japan)
